title: 114_hr2963
content: Bring Jobs Home Act Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) grant business taxpayers anbsp. Tax credit for up to 20 of insourcing expenses incurred for eliminating anbsp, business located outside the United States andnbsp. Relocating it within the United States, and (2) deny a tax deduction for outsourcing expenses incurred in relocating a US business outside the United States. Requires an increase in the taxpayer's employment of full-time employeesnbsp. In the United States in order to claim the tax credit for insourcing expenses.
